active

@Input()
active: boolean = false
  • Defined in src/ui-shell/header/header-action.component.ts:38

Toggles the active state. May be used to toggle a Panels active state.

activeChange: EventEmitter<boolean> = new EventEmitter<boolean>()
  • Defined in src/ui-shell/header/header-action.component.ts:42

"Change" emitter to allow double binding to the active Input.
